body: ..ALMOST EVERY FUCKIN TANK,STORY,DOUJIN SOMEONE SHIT OUT TO THIS FUCKING SITE IS FUCKING NTRASH.WHAT THE FUCK IS WRONG WITH YOU PEOPLE? -- ANTI-NTRASH MOVEMENT --

The old guy get fucked because he do not wear a full-face helmet.
The cucked guy get fucked because he do not wear a fucking helmet.
Half of his army do not have a proper helmet to actually protect their face.

Moral of the story: Don't be a cheap arrogant dick, wear a helmet, a full-face one. Helmet saves your woman and your life.

Oh! And learn to use poison. If a spear won't take those bastards down, why he choose to use a crossbow, without dipping it with his shit?
